content.detailedDescription: Went out side to smoke  6 am on the 3rd  seen  3 lights  in kind of a triangle  position in the sky  two moved  side by side  parallel two each other  then the  third disappeared. the  two that moved  moved across the sky then stopped  then stay there until dawn  while the  two were moving  one  flew above them  away from them  and  other  was  heading toward them  at a high rate .....   just  want to know if anyone else  has seen  things like
content.summary: 5  star like objects  in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On january 6th 2012 between 5:30 - 6pm i was driving in a northerly direction. i looked up to see a jet and it's usual line of smoke that follows, but a round, silver circular ball was hovering just under the trail of smoke. i kept watching it trying to figure out what it was, but had to look at the road to turn in a westerly direction. i went to grab my phone, but when i looked back up, the ball was gone. i told myself i must've seen a reflection of some sort, but then caught sight of a blinking round ball moving quickly in a westerly direction ahead of me. it looked like a star does when twinkling at night. i tried to keep my eyes on it but it was moving very fast and i couldn't see it anymore. i counted 6 jets in the sky at that time, all with the smoke trailing behind them, but no sight of the object i saw earlier.
content.summary: Saw round reflective ball near tail of smoke from jet, when jet moved east ball moved quickly west, blinked like a star, disappeared from sight

content.detailedDescription:
Report of ufo sighting -- january 5, 2012
note: this account was created the day after (jan. 6, 2012) the night of the sighting.

where: bedford, indiana.
time: approximately 7 pm.
witness: reporter, alone, 66 yr old male; retired secondary school teacher
testimony:
i had returned home after having dinner with friends at a local restaurant. despite it being january, the night was not particularly cold, and the sky was spectacularly clear. after parking the car, i stood in my driveway looking at the stars. it occurred to me that if there was any night that one might have the chance to see a ufo, this was that kind of night, and i actually thought, i wish i could see one now. not two minutes passed after that thought when i clearly saw a row of star-colored and star-sized lights passing almost directly overhead, traveling due west. the right hand half of the row was dimmer, and some of the individual lights were not visible, but those on the left hand were all distinctly visible. though i did not have the presence of mind to count them, i know the left half was surely showing more than 4 lights, and probably six, but the right half showed only two; only the one furthest from the midpoint was particularly distinct. as i kept my attention focused on the row of moving lights, i tried to detect any sound the phenomenon might be making, but there was nothing out of the ordinary; it seemed to be completely silent. at the same time, i saw that the row of lights was not a straight line but that they were arranged in a wide l or flying wing configuration. the phenomenon moved steadily at an unchanging high rate of speed and altitude to the west, and as the distance between us increased, suddenly the full complement of lights became visible, an equal number on the left and right. at no time did any of the visible lights change position in relation to one another, nor did they blink or strobe or change colors. the phenomenon was in my field of vision for approximately three seconds and was then instantly not visible, possibly because it passed below the tree line or below the roof line of my car shelter. after a few minutes, i went into the house feeling elated and after a few more minutes decided to call one of the people i had been having dinner with and tell him about the sighting. this i did, but since i have brought up the subject of ufos and my belief in their existence before, i am not sure how seriously any of my friends take my report of this event.

note: bedford, indiana is apparently almost directly beneath major east-west and north-south commercial flyways. the reporter has had very frequent opportunity to see both high altitude and medium altitude airline overflights, and also nighttime overflights of small to medium-sized commercial aircraft making descent approaches almost directly over his home on the way to louisville, kentucky. this event was nothing like those overflights in either sounds (or lack of sound) and sights. additionally, all the low-altitude flyovers come in from the west and make a banking right turn over bedford to approach louisville. they do not approach from the east and then simply pass over bedford at low to medium altitude.

impressions:
although the lights were clearly in a flying wing arrangement, the actual craft in front of them was almost invisible. i actually got the impression that a piece of the night sky was moving across my field of vision. if i had not had the row of lights to focus on, i doubt i would have even noticed its passage.

because of the phenomenons silence and speed, i simply could not get a good impression of its altitude and physical size, though it seemed to me that it was quite large; certainly as a wingspan, it would be remarkable, and the greater the altitude, the more remarkable the size. the next day, i took a ruler to the spot where i was standing, and holding it out at arms length, estimated the object measured 3 to 4 across at arms length. several high-flying commercial aircraft were overhead at the same time as this sighting, but in comparison, they were mere points of strobing lights, and they were visible for minutes rather than seconds.

the gradual revelation of the individual right hand lights, and the nearly instant disappearance of the entire row as the phenomenon sped westward suggests to me that one must be very fortunately at the exact proper angle of observation in order to detect this type of ufo at all.

comments:
although i have been interested in ufo reports for many years, i do not spend much time actually watching the skies to spot them in transit. usually, i only do so a few minutes at a time, such as this one when i was simply pausing on the way from the car shelter to the back door of my house. therefore, considering the very narrow window of opportunity here, either this was an extremely unlikely coincidence (im watching just as it is passing by), or these things are really quite commonly in the skies above us though we simply dont notice them.

my overall interpretation of this experience is that although it was an extraordinary encounter with a remarkable piece of technology that has highly secret military capabilities, this is very likely a man-made craft. i am still waiting for the unequivocable alien encounter.
content.summary: Fixed relationship lights in a flying wing configuration.

content.detailedDescription: My sister called me and told me to go look over the colorado monument that there was two red lights.  so i went out and saw one light that was bright red. i could tell it was over the horizon and was not a car.  i was looking further west for the second light when she told me the first light shot another light out of it that went across the sky.Then when i looked back at the light it started to fade then disappeared.
content.summary: Red light over monument

content.detailedDescription: Around 830pm as i was leaving the barn and walking ot my house i felt as i was being watched so i turned around and looked up and saw lights blinking ,i went and got my binoculars and i saw a larg disk shaped craft with glowing green aturn on the surface and at the outer edge of th craft was red ,blue ,green, white light blinking in verryed pattern ,i then went and got my camera and took a few shots and then shot a few short vids of it and it backed away south south est out of range of my cam so i went in asn got my teloscope and  set it up and it was to bright in the teloscope to make out any thing but the lights , i then went in the house it was still there , i also seen it again on 1-6-2012 but it was far out of range of my camera but i could make out the color of  lights , on 1-2-2012 i also seen a redish orange ball of light fly over heading in the same genral drection at a high rates of speed with no sound ,it went from horizion to horizion in 3 to 5 sec
content.summary: Disk with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a glowing white orb at 11:25 (26?) am going over forest park, il.  from the bottom of the orb was either a beam of light or a gas emission moving like a pendulum from left to right.  i thought maybe this was an lost kite (reflecting the sun) with a tail, but it never changed its glow and the beam coming from the bottom would have been the thickest kite tail i've ever seen.  it was came from the west and went almost directly east (slightly southeast) in a striaght path.  it did not dip or change altitude.  frankly, i think it was moving slightly against the wind.  no sound.

the orb was higher than a jet leaving o'hare.  i am familiar with jets and helicopters, and live along the flight path of air traffic.  it does cross my mind that this could have been a reflective balloon or kite, but those don't move in a deliberate path and do change altitude.  also the glow or reflection never flickered, like a reflection does.  kite tails and balloon strings don't move like a pendulum usually, do they?  i suppose if they're weighted it's possible.  but this orb was so high up, and the lightbeam or gas emission from the bottom was thick and visible, not thin or narrow and twisty like string or a tail.  it was a stiff, pendulum-like motion.

here is the weirdest coincidence:  two minutes before the sighting i had a strong urge to go outside.  prior to that something popped into my mind telling me i was going to see a ufo today.  i went outside to smoke, and was thinking about sharing this feeling with my s.O., but i was like, "naah.  what if i am wrong?  don't be weird."  at that moment a jet was going west to east and a moment later i saw the orb.  just like that!  i honestly can't explain why i felt like this sighting was going to happen right before it happened, and i feel like - this is crazy - that the ufo was letting me know it was there.  i had the entire feeling while watching the object, and the whole thing lasted about a minute or less.  it was out of sight more quickly than a departing jet.  i was really paying attention to it moving by, and towards the end of the sighting i wanted to grab my binoculars inside and i went for them.  i swear to you, it communicated to me that it would be out of sight by the time i returned.  and it was.  i looked for a good long time but it was gone.
content.summary: White orb emitting lightbeam or gas from bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work driving west and about to turn north onto my road when i looked over to the small air strip to my left and notice that about a hundred feet behind it and approximently a hundred feet up was a bright circular object hovering. the object was huge bigger than a basket ball and it was blinking like a strobe light. i then turned onto the dirt road so i could get a better look at it. it looked to be blinking like a flash from a camera. it would flash right to left. it was brighter than the sun or any star i have seen. it made my head and eyes hurt just looking at it. the object didn't seem to be moveing, just hovering above the trees. like it was watching. i know that i look over at the airstrip on a regular basises because in the distance you can see the city lights at night. but there has never been any lights other than the small light attached to the small hanger for the airstrip and the city light over ten miles away. there is nothing but country and farms between the two. so, it was a shock to see such a bright orb or object there. there was no planes in the area that i am aware of, nor do we have any light houses in the area to make a light that bright. there was no sound, no red or blue lights to signal a plan or helicoper. just a huge light blinking light a stobe light. after about 5 minutes i just started to drive down the road to go home. my eyes still hurt from last nights experience. i told my stepdad and husband of what i saw. i wish they would have been with me.
content.summary: Large white light blinking like a strobe light. bright as the sun hurt to look at.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down i40 headed into nashville after the 40/24 split and saw what looked like a civilian plane with an engine on fire traveling roughly north to south. there was a stream of sparks which looked to be over 60 long trailing behind a plane (its hard to estimate distance at night). the sparks could clearly be seen and it was below five thousand feet. the only reason im guessing it was a plane was there appeared to be blinking lights which correspond to civilian airplane tail/wing marker lights. one piece came off still trailing sparks and began to fall slowly towards the earth. then a second piece fell off and had the same rate off decent. after both of these fell and tail of sparks ceased we were expecting this plane to start to fall from the sky assuming it was a dual engine passenger plane breaking up. our focus then shifted to the two falling objects second of which reversed direction and travels towards the first. as they overlap the first goes out and the second continues in a near horizontal trajectory. while watching this we had lost focus of the plane which is catching back up with the second sparking object. just before the plane reaches the object it goes out.At this point both of us have no idea what we just witnessed. by no means do we think it was extra terrestrial in origin but we are unable to find anything on the web. my friend who witnessed this posted a topix thread in the nashville forum and received one quality response so far. i am aware there is an international airport and air force base at the donelson exit, but this was in no way near an approach for either being several miles west of both. i have also seen military flares first hand (magnesium and phosphorous) and they are single points of light with faint reflection of smoke at night. these were however tails of sparks and not a traditional flare.
content.summary: Large trail of sparks with two falling pieces

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared out of the tree-line and caught my friend and is attention immediately because it was extremely bright. the light coming from it had a brownish hue and was at least 20 times brighter than any plane light in the sky. the light was constant and there were no flashing lights coming from it, as is required after dark. the ufo hovered north, before slowly stopping, then heading the opposite way, keeping a precisely consistent altitude and distance from my location. i am not aware of any man made machinery that is capable of such a maneuver. the object slipped back into the tree-line, and since we were in a car, i tried to drive and get a better view. about 20 seconds later, when i had a clear view of the horizon, it was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Intensely bright hovering object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking up the hill to my apt. when i noticed a huge light in the sky. i looked ay it almost the whole time i was walking. this was about 6:15 pm, when i reached my alley i saw my neighbors standing by our bldg. i stopped to talk to him in which i hadn't said anything about what i saw just yet. we talked for about five minutes and the light moved to a very visible position as the line of sight was blocked by another building in the alley. i then said,"the northstar is the brightest star in the sky, isn't it" he said yeah, then i told him to look up and i said , what the heck is that? we stood there trying to understand what it was then about two minutes later i saw out of the corner of my eye another object just as bright as the northstar moving at a stead pace then i said look do you see that as i pointed to it. he looked and was like whoa! what's going on. we watched it slowly ascend, getting dimmer and dimmer til it disappeared. then about 5 minutes later he saw behind us the same type of object flying apparently the same speed doing the same as the second object. we were out there for a half an hour then i went and got my other neighbor and she was amazed. we then seen a few jets circling for about an hour going in the direction of the very bright object. we were excited at all of this as we believe in this subject matter. we know about the reptilians and the anunnaki. finally, another one of my friends called me on the other side of the neighborhood called me and i told him  to go out the house and look towards west homestead and before i could say another word he said oh shut i definitely see it, its turning colors. the air force came to see what it was and i know if they come its definitely something unknown. i have five siblings who were in the air force three who were in for twenty or more years. they told me of things they saw growing up and while in the airforce. my mother witnessed one in pittsburgh that was witnessed by the whole neighborhood and it was close to the houses. i know about this stuff and it was an exciting two hours. i've seen many and i even had a visit from the ashtar command when i was a child, i remember like it was today! please get back with me as i have some video footage on my phone about it. they aren't hiding anymore.
content.summary: Super bright light , brighter than north star with 2 more flying opp. direction

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a bright star that was closer than most stars it was changing rainbow colours.  there were many planes and jets during the time i watched it.  i have footage but am unable to download at the moment.
content.summary: Colour changing bright star with alot of airplane/ jet traffic as well

content.detailedDescription: I saw an object, around or the night before christmas eve 2011, over the south sf bayarea near fremont's automall.My home is near the 880 freeway and automall. the craft was difficult to see and at first i thought maybe it was an owl but it did not move anything like wings and if it was gliding it did not seem to lose altitude. it moved in a straight line. it seemed to disappear at times and i saw a faint outline of the leading edge, either crescent shaped or triangular. i finally decided it was translucent, not being sure if it was obscuring the stars. it was headed almost due south. i am a pilot so i am somewhat familiar with bearing and altitude estimation. i suspected this object at about a thousand feet, but then perhaps it was higher. size was difficult to gauge. at night it is recommended to look at an object at a slight off center angle and the more i tried to look straight at it, the more difficult it was to see, it finally disappeared. the constellation orion was south east of the object and it was about 11pm. i make no estimate of speed, but i think it was in view from the time i noticed it almost directly overhead until i lost sight of it maybe 45 seconds to a minute. there were no lights, only the faint outline.
content.summary: Translucent crescent/ chevron-triangle object

content.detailedDescription:
At 2:45 pm on 1/5/2012, i was driving east on michigan avenue in lansing, mi when i looked up out my front windshield and saw a reflective object in the sky.  i continued to watch the object as it was heading nw coming from a se direction.  i turned north onto waverly road and continued to watch the object realizing that it had no lights, wings, tail, no chem trail or sound and did not waiver from its path.  it appeared to be a cigar shaped, white, reflective object.  during my 30 minute lunch hour from work, i was able to visibly observe over 5 commercial jet liners that were clearly at 30,000 ft or higher and flying from w to e or e to w.  there were chem trails everywhere yesterdaythe object that i observed did not have any chem trail.   

lansing has an airport north off of waverly road and the object did not seem the least bit interested in the airport.  in fact, i watched the object continue on its slow and steady path nw until it was a white speck--perhaps heading in the northern illinois direction. 

i was disappointed that it went out of view so quickly, but i am also with the feeling that it will not be the last time we will see them. it almost seemed to be on a mission heading somewhere directly.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft--no noticeable lights, tail, wings or chem trail

content.detailedDescription:
8:40 pm:

i was traveling west on toll road 528 in orlando @ exit #2. i saw to 
my left a blue light hovering in the air(approx 200ft from me and 300ft 
in the air. 

it slowly got brighter and dimmer repeatedly. it moved to the 
right just a little bit 3 times. as i grabbed for my phone/camera it 
started backing away from me first lowering altitude then raising 
altitude back to original altitude repeatedly till it was out of sight.


i watched it perform this action approx 5 times before it was out of sight.
i did get 2 pictures as it was leaving.
content.summary: Orlando blue light @ 8:40pm

content.detailedDescription: At around the same time every evening for the last three days and on previous occasions the same glowing sphere makes a slow descent to horizon and when it gets close to the horizon a second glowing sphere pops up usually to the right of the object with the same pulsation glow of pinkish-red. because of its higher intensity in color and brightness in comparisson to any other objects in the sky, i immediately was locked onto this object until it faded below the horizon and would periodically resurface until finally it did not do so again. i had a clear view of it for the entire duration of its flight. i would welcome any field investigators to join us in wittnessing this event. my digital camera would not show the target in the viewer, so unfortunately i dont have any images or footage. i am sure that it will appear again tomorrow and maybe again the next evening.
content.summary: Third night of sighting. predict more to come. welcome your represenatives to help clarify this anomaly

content.detailedDescription: At around the same time every evening for the last three days and on previous occasions the same glowing sphere makes a slow descent to horizon and when it gets close to the horizon a second glowing sphere pops up usually to the right of the object with the same pulsation glow of pinkish-red. because of its higher intensity in color and brightness in comparisson to any other objects in the sky, i immediately was locked onto this object until it faded below the horizon and would periodically resurface until finally it did not do so again. i had a clear view of it for the entire duration of its flight. i would welcome any field investigators to join us in wittnessing this event. my digital camera would not show the target in the viewer, so unfortunately i dont have any images or footage. i am sure that it will appear again tomorrow and maybe again the next evening.
content.summary: Third night of sighting. predict more to come. welcome your represenatives to help clarify this anomaly

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home at 9:45 pm, and parked my car on the street.
i realized that a bright red light was viewable from my front yard to the east of my house, and that it was similiar, or the same red light ufo that i viewed in the east in september in the same neighborhood.
i immediately called a friend that lives a few blocks away, that viewed a  red light ufo with me in september at his house in the same neighborhood.
he in turn called his father, who lives up on the bench in boise idaho, around 4-5 miles from where we live, which is several hundred feet lower in elevation than his father lives, in a shallow river valley. his father confirmed that the ufo was fairly high in the sky. this gives me reason to think that the ufo was probably over 500 feet high in the sky, any lower, and my friends father would have only barely been able to see it, and it would probably have around the same height as the mountains behind boise. 

after calling my friend, i ran inside after trying to catch a photo using my blackberry phone.
i scrambled for my digital coolpix camera, and ran outside to shoot a shaky, quick photo....
realizing i needed a tripod to get any decent photos of the light blown up, i again ran inside and was able to set up my digital camera, and shoot around 12 photos over a 15 minute period.
shortly after taking just a few photos, the ufo, moved a good 50 degrees northwest, and was basically overhead just north of us.
the movement was straight, with no noise, and the light just pulsated slowly, or was completely unwavering in its strength for a minute or so. then it would start pulsating again.
the ufo then moved back to its almost original position, taking a slightly different path.
the entire movement period was no longer than a few minutes if that.
it moved at an even pace, and i wondered how anything could move that fast in the sky, if it was a balloon or such being towed from the ground.
even a balloon/blimp with an engine would have to be moving pretty good to cover that distance.
once it was stationary again, i commenced taking more photos
i drained the battery, but was able to get around 9 photos that had little movement, and actually showed either artifacts of the light/camera, or actual structure of what i believe is plasma formations.

around the mid point of the event, a plane high in the sky flew above us, and could probably see the ufo as well, this was not a jet. we could hear the engine, and see the flashing lights of the plane....Each little flashing red light on the plane, was something like 1/20th the intensity/size of this red pulsating ufo.
it was strong enough light, i doubted it was a chinese lantern, and when the ufo moved it didnt flicker, as if a candle were illuminating it.

the entire viewing lasted around 35-40 minutes.

i watched the ufo until it "left" which was interesting, and gave me the idea that it was either a digital light controlled hoax, but not a flare or candle/torch in a balloon.
the ufo moved slightly back east, very slightly, or, it actually shrunk in size, and then it started pulsating faster, and then started strobing for the first time, it strobed completely on and off around 4-6 times at a relative even pace, and then quickly increased completely strobing on and off, and then just completely dissapeared.

i have only seen a ufo twice before this, in september a few months before, and what we saw on dec 24 looked very similiar, or basically the same as the september sighting.
except in september, it was lower on the horizon, and we watched it drift out of view after 20 minutes, instead of watching it strobe and dissapear.

the first ufo i saw, was an orb/light ufo, that was red, like this ufo i saw in december, this was in 1978, in mccall idaho, that ufo sped quickly from far away, or grew in size, and quickly stopped over a tree directly to the north of me and some adults inside and above a tree in our yard that was no more than 30 feet tall. (i was 8 years old at the time)
that ufo wasnt more than 60-80 feet from us, and was a 4-5 foot wide ball of spinning glowing energy that spun red/orange/purple colors very quickly. that ufo suddenly shot up into the sky, turned white, and split in two and quickly dissapeared into the night sky.

after i saw blow ups of the dec 4th 2011 photos i took, i was blown away, but how similiar the ball of glowing colors was to the ball i saw so many years ago up in mccall....
from a distance, the lights look like a very bright glowing red ball shining with intensity...
but up close, there is soft edges, different colors, spinning intensity in the one i saw up close.

looking at the photos, blowing them up, using different controls on editing the photos, and even using a redeye removing software to look past some of the red glare, i am convinced this is some sort of plasma formation. there are some very interesting phenomenon/or camera artifacts viewable in these photos, which were all taken by myself on dec. 24th 2011 at 9.45pm until around 10:20 pm.
please ask for permission to publish these photos anywhere.

there were some similiar reports the next night in boise idaho, and i noticed also reports in oregon, washington, and california that sounded similiar.

i am not very knowledgeable about how plasma balls form.
but i have been doing research for the last week ever since taking these photos.
a physicist i lived with at one time, told me plasma balls can be controlled by military technology, and even project sounds.
this light i saw in december, seemed either motionless/hovering, or moved in a very regular, seemingly controlled fashion.
my impression in the beginning, before seeing the photos, is that this was an oject that was lit up, and not a glowing plasma ball like i had seen as a child in mccall, and that it was some sort of glowing blimp, hoax, or a ufo aircraft.
i had the impression that this was under control of some intelligence of some sort.
but understand that plasma formations can be a natural occurence.
seeing the photos i am convinced its a plasma energy ball, if the photos are viewed under the right conditions/filtered correctly, you can see flame  like whisps shooting out and around the ball of light, as if the plasma ball was actually bigger than it looked.
also notice in some of the photos, under the ufo around 1/2-3/4 of the photo, there can be seen a strange glowing purple area, either a ball shape, or like two small balls on the sides of a larger ball.
i am under the impression, that this is some sort of plasma formation, but very subtle, and that this purple light has something to do with the phenomenon that i witnessed.
it occurred to me, that the energy "feeding" this plasma ball, might be a field extending far beyond what looks like to be a solid object from a distance. the strange purple light is present in more than 2 of these photos, but is not viewable on all of them.

in comparing all the photos, i see what looks like a cloudy mass, with irregularities, but fairly circular, but in others, it looks like a squarish, irregular spinning object, with dimpled areas that sometimes line up quite straight and regularly spaced, almost a sort of stiple effect. and in one photo, the interior looks as if it has bilateral symmetry going on, much like what a walnut shell looks like

some sources claim that stationary/hovering ufo's are in a low energy use period, and glow red, but as they speed up, they turn blue/white.
that might fit somewhat with what i saw in mccall, as the ufo did turn white upon flying directly up into the sky...
but the ufo viewed on december 24th, did not "power" up, or change color when it did its short maneuver. of course, it was not moving extremely fast comparable to the viewing of the red/white light in 1978

absolutely one of the most exciting nights of my life, in that i was finally able to get photos of a ufo. everything fell together, right place, right time, camera in the house, and a ufo that sticks around for long enough.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A pulsating, bright, red light, that did not blink until the very end of viewing it. it moved a few times and was very bright.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i went for a walk around 7pm, when i spotted a bright light in the sky, just above the mountains silouhette. i thought it was extremely strange because i knew immediately it wasnt a star. i thought it mightve been jupiter or a radio tower, but there was a tower just a few miles away and it blunk red, not white.
it just stayed there, then my friend noticed that it had moved to the right.
we were just hanging around and talking, staying in the same spot. we used a jungle gym to see higher and noticed it was very brightly twinkling. i had recently taken an astrology class and could easily identify this as nothing id studied.
we stayed for awhile, watching it trace the mountains outline very, very slowly. fog came over us and the light was dim for a short bit. it went away and the ufo hovered over a lower part of the mountain side. it stayed like that for a few minutes, then descended into the forested mountain.
content.summary: Hovered over mountain, temporarily covered by fog, traced mountain silouette, then descended into forest.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my vehicle and taking groceries into my home when i observed an object just below the cloud cover, that made no noise, covered about 10 miles in less than 2 minutes, and flew in a straight path. the objects appearance was a flickering bright white flame with a red lens surrounding the bottom of it. the flame would flicker at a slow steady pace (like observing a large fire from a distance) although the wind should have had a greater affect considering the speed at which it moved. there were no flashing or pulsating lights that would make me think it was an airplane, helicopter, weather balloon, or satellite. it flew from a southwesterly direction to a northeasterly direction, flying just under a small amount of cloud cover, and disappeared into the clouds just above it. prior to new years 2012, i had never seen anything in the sky that i could not explain away. so far, this year, i have seen 3 different objects on 3 different nights/days that i have no explanation as to what they were.
content.summary: Flickering flame partially surrounded by red film/glass/plastic

content.detailedDescription: I went on my back porch to enjoy a cigarette. i take a look up in the sky and notice a a star. i thought it was just part of a triangle shape i usally associate in the sky. then the lower part started moving down then started to go away from the other stars. then it vanished!
content.summary: What i though was a star moved!

content.detailedDescription: I was about to sleep, and in my mirror i saw this bright ass star, i thought it was a planet so i went to my window, i was about to take a picture with my phone and it disappeared, i was like what the #$%^, then i saw it again, really dull, but it was huge, and like a mile away into the wooded area behind my house, i grabbed a knife and a jacket, and went to see if it was military or something, i was walking for fifteen minutes before it stated descending, i ran toward it, and realized that it was big. i realized that planes don't just fall slowly, helicopters do that. i hid in this brush because it wasn't a helicopter, it hovered for maybe five minutes before it landed, people came out in these uniforms, they had big round eyes, one had almond shaped goggles on, i hid there for about twenty more minutes, before that took and animal or something back onto the plane, i felt like the one with the goggles was looking at me, he like smiled or some @#$%, i was scared, but when he looked at me i felt comforted, i blacked out at one point and woke up in my yard, where i had seen the ship, a helicopter was going slowly by, it wasnt a loud copter, so i thought maybe that was what i saw before, but then a couple days later it hit me, i remembered it, i had to take the day off work because i was too shaky to write
content.summary: Looked out window, ran outside, saw lights, hid on ground, things came out, went back in with animal or something

content.detailedDescription:
One night on a small caribbean island (18.05 n, 63.12 w)there was one (of the regular) blackouts. i was with a lady-friend at her house(she is from argentina). both of us divorced and with minor aged children, visited each other regularly. 10 mins before the event we (only) went outside as it was very hot that evening in the house. exactly at the time mentioned, both of us lying on the hood of my car, i observed a dark dull disc-shaped object appear directly overhead flying east to west. i stared at it for a few seconds and it flew slowly westward, i spoke out to her and lifted my arm to point to it but she had already seen it too and exclaimed, in spanish: "look at that....Space vehicles". i was overjoyed because i have had more observations but this one was finally with a witness. the object was clearly disc-like, no lighting but it could have had an inner glow in the center which was deep bronze like. the rest of the vehicle was very dark, it was a moonless night and as it went it blotted out the visible stars. as soon as she spoke the following event occured; another object
appeared and it was the same size in my eyes and it must have been flying directly below or above the other one because it appeared to have been slingshot like on an elastic band and it oscillated back and forth a few times (while in the same forward motion) to and from the other unit and then like it locked into position - for us to the left of the other one and together they flew side by side without wavering westward into the sky towards the horizon where they disappeared into the haze in the distance. our bodies on the hood of the car were aligned with our heads due east and our feet towards the west. the roof of the house was east as well as a range of hills, we did not notice the event untill the objects were directly overhead. no sound or noise accompanied this event. my lady-friend is a level-headed english school-teacher who never before believed in these type of events. i have been an observer to several more events like this one in past times..Therefore i do not get excited anymore. i sometimes do try to attract attention by waving at them. the flightpath of these objects observed would have brought them near the island of puerto rico (vieques), they must also have flown directly over the airport of this small island (juliana airport).
content.summary: Dark burnished bronze colored discs

content.detailedDescription: Finished watching a tv program, i had an impulse to go outside and look towards the east into a clear night sky while looking at the stars. this was highly unusual since i had not done so for quite a long time. i noticed one particular light that did not appear as a star in a usual way. looking at it, it was pulsating multiple colors, orb-like and somewhat bigger than the surrounding stars. it did not move as i was looking at it. it was also lower in the sky that the other stars in that view of the sky. i then went inside for binoculars, 7x35mm, to get a better look and asked my girlfriend to come outside for her impression and view of it, as well. she saw it, looked through the binoculars, and observed the same as i did. the circular edges were fuzzy and it was an indistinct, orb shape but the colors kept changing in an unnatural way. these colors were brighter and deeper in color/range than a more natural, star-like manner. my reaction was that it was interesting, definitely a ufo to me and to her, but i was not able to spend more than about 10 minutes looking at it. we went back inside. about 30 minutes later, i went outside again to see if the object still appeared or had moved. not to my surprise, the object was nowhere in the sky and had disappeared.
content.summary: Object, orb-like and stationary glowing multiple colors unlike a star and somewhat bigger.

content.detailedDescription: The object was moving very fast on a due south course in midday.  id estimate 125 mph, and id guess it was 1k feet high.
content.summary: The object was moving very fast on due south course in midday

content.detailedDescription: It was a late 7:00 when i looked outside i love the solar system so i was looking at the beautiful stars, then out of the corner of my eye i saw something it was cylinder shape hovering.I told my family to come look, and i got a piece of paper and pencil and started drawing i looked at it,it seemed to stop if it was a plain it would have fell out of the sky.It all of the sudden shot up like, miles and miles away it soon got so far away i couldnt see it any more. i rember it was a grey leadish color it had lights that were light blue,it could alomost be white. i can rember it like it was yesterday.I still have the drawing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was like i cylinder shape that i saw i was so amazed

content.detailedDescription:
The siting i had, and got pictures of, was witnessed by about 8-12 people along the trail head. the others who witnessed this after i pointed the objects out to every one around me thought that the three objects were parasailors, clear out in the distance. after they got in closer, we could all see that by the way that they maneuvered, that they obviously werent parasailors. 

i stopped because there has been a lot of military flight activity from camp williams since october and the flight path is the same one these were taking to hill. i talked with the faa in october and they confirmed "there has been a lot of activity out of camp williams to hill, and i (bonnie-faa) know for a fact there are more military helos than usual because they land very close to my office and keep them running the whole time before they lift off again. the fumes make it hard for me (bonnie-faa) to breath sometimes".

so, in all reality, at first i thought they were military birds and since i was right there and had a camera, i thought i would get some good shots of some choppers. they werent choppers or parasailors either. i don't want an investigation, i just want to make a report and submit evidence to let the public know that our airspace is being violated.

since this is a ufo related site for utah, i thought i would give this site a try.
content.summary: Three objects hovered, maintained level flight, came straight for us hovered, formed eql triangle flew in fomation back to starting point, hovered then faded into nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
I heard and saw 4 planes buzzing over my house in "air show" formation.  i had never heard of "chemtrails".  thought we were under attack.  although i never saw or heard the 'anomalies", this is the raw photo of 5 ufo's, that just happened to zip by as i shot the pictures of these chemtrails.  i was using a telephoto lens.  it took me over a week to see them..... i never noticed they were there on the day that i took these shots.

i have already posted some photos to your mufon utah site.  check them out there as it took a long time to upload them to that site and i don't want have to do that again.

my gut feel is that they are some kind of military next generation drones with an advanced propulsion system.
content.summary: I wsa taking pictures of "chemtrails".  i didn't see or hear them, but they showed up in the pictures

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting.                  12/21/2011          afton / oklahoma   7:45pm
                                                                             weather.  the temp was 33 deg.  visibility clear. ceiling  unlimited.     i hoped in to my atv and went 1 mile south of town into a hay field on top of a hill. good visibility here. no city light to the east south and west.I turned off all lights and lay on the ground looking up letting my eyes get use to the dark.7:50 to 8:10 looking up seeing normal air traffic . at 8:20 i herd some noise to the south.I got up and went to the front of my atv and herd some howling . it was coyotes . 8:25 still standing looking south i turned and looked south west. i see a white light low moving from the south to the north. did not think anything of it till about 1 minute in. under the white light was a red light. it seem to pulse red once a second . still moving north it stopped then went back south vary vary quick then stopped for 2 seconds then started moving north again. i thought i was seeing things. still moving north the white light had an amber tint to it. still moving north its gone from south west to do west. getting closer it seemed. there was no sound from it. the only sounds i could here were the truck and car traffic on the highway 5 miles away. looking west watching this object still moving north it stops again shoots south again then stops then starts moving north again. i got the willies then started talking to myself . what is this.Do i see this. still the object is moving north . still seeing the white light with amber tint and red pulsating light under it. its now wnw of me moving north then it blinked off. when it went off i reached down for my binoculars and looked for the object up down left right it was gone. i did not want to grab the binoculars and take my eyes off it . i have spent thousands of hours out side fishing/camping ext. and thousands looking up. i know what normal aircraft look and sound like.   the 4 to 5 minutes i was watching this object it traveled about 8 miles. i know the object i saw was not something i can identify . when this object stopped and went south twice it traveled about 2 miles in a tenth of a second . humans have not built anything like that   yet   .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Visible for 4 to 5 minutes white light with amber tint and a single red fhrobing moving north stoping 2 times  then  lights went out.

content.detailedDescription: I was 23 yrs old at the time and was walking home to a friend of mine and his parents house who were kind enough to let me stay with them. i was almost midnight and i was walking west on the north side of yucca junior high just a few houses away from where i was going. i believe the street is tilden. there were two people walking towards me (a little bit older couple .. walking east) approx 20 feet in front of me .. when all of a sudden a very large (larger than a full moon) slightly egg shaped object flew over at about a 75 degree angle coming from the southwest headed northeast ... glowing a very strange lumenecently white light with absolutely no sound. when i saw it .. of course i was "awwed" and a dumbstruck and totally gawking at it while it passed over head. it crossed the sky in no more than 5 seconds. it was hard to tell just how big it was or how high up it was, but i'm guesstimating a couple of thousand feet maybe.  i could have been as big as a football field and higher up or smaller and lower down. dimension and height were just not decernable. i started to ask the people who were in front of me now (within 5 feet by now) if they saw that .. but they were looking at me like i was crazy and obviously i figured they never even saw it or they wouldn't have been looking at me; instead they'd been looking up at it, so i didn't bother saying anything to them. i just continued walking totally amazed at what had just happened to me.  i'm 57 yrs old now and although some other things have happened to me in my life (i will not go into) this has been the only prominent sighting i have had. i live in amarillo tx and am always going back and forth to roswell on a regular basis (weekly, monthly) so i always keep my eye to the sky. over the years i have spoken with many 'ol timers and have heard many strange stories. i even met a man who was in the airforce(stationed at roswell)at the time of the '47 crash and he told me "it happened and he knew the nurse personally who saw the greys" .... so that's my story after 34 years i decided to share it with you. what it comes down to is everyone is a skeptic untill you see one close up for the first time and then you know something is going on !  seeing is believing ! ...... thankyou   .. b a
content.summary: Figured it's time to tell what i saw in roswell .. approx  summer of 1976

content.detailedDescription: I happened to be gazing at the stars on my terrace as usual.I noticed a star really bright.After a few seconds, i noticed it move in the south - east direction on a curved path.I ran in to call my friend out .Both of us were astonished.We saw it move really quick as if it was gaining speed n then all of a sudden, the light started to dim quickly .Unfortunately we did not have any camera to record or even take a picture..:(
content.summary: At first stationary then stated to move in s-e direction ascending and the light quickly disappeared
